'''Damon Lannister''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. He is long deceased before the start of the series. He once was the [[Lord of Casterly Rock]] and an ancestor to [[House Lannister]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Lord Damon is a renowned tourney knight, even when ruling as Lord of Casterly Rock. He died during the [[Great Spring Sickness]], an epidemic that swept the Seven Kingdoms during the reign of King [[Daeron II Targaryen]]. He was succeeded by his son Tybolt Lannister.
